mean_cn: v. 赋予形体，具体化，物质化
mean_en: to become visible :to appear especially in a sudden or magical way
word_etyma: material物质的+ize动词后缀，...化 →赋予…形体
short_phrase: The ghost materializes out of thin air.
sentence: It is said that the little monkey originally materialized from a stone.
sentence_trans: 据说孙悟空是石头变成的。
